page.title: 12Occupations.
page.content: We found out from the questionnaires that the people in{Shawbury}have a variety of jobs. We put the jobs into 10 categaries. These are R.A.F,Professional, Government,Skilled Manual,Unskilled Manual,Clerical,Housewives,Unemployed and Retired. The category with the greatest number of people working in it was the {R.A.F. 26%}of the people worked on the{R.A.F.}station. The next largest group were the { {housewives}with 19%.There are 14% of people who are{retired.}Out of the other groups{skilled manual}had 11%, {unskilled manual}had 4%.{Clerical}had quite a low number of 9%.{Professional and{government}had close numbers of 6% and 5%. We were amazed to see only 1% of people were{unemployed}which shows Shawbury has high employment.
